column4: am trying this VirtualBox, i already added my user to the vboxusers, but when i launch VirtualBox it says still to add the user to vboxuserrs
forgive me if i already shared this with you, but you might get better help about virtualbox on one of their irc channels: http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Community
thanks..thats where i got the download..and just curious why adding a user as member of a group requires a total logout first
